name: THE MAN (Allan Kang)
description:
What are you addicted to?

The man is 3D artwork that arouse people's attention to addiction.

You can give him a pleasure, but every time you give him he will be more and more blunted with it and eventually he won't be able to take it anymore.

You can also stop this if that is what you truly want. Put the thing into the grinder. Destroy what disturbs your life.

Resolving him from the addiction or leaving him, it depends on your choice.
